snippet: Forgotten vials of smallpox were discovered by workers cleaning out an old storage room, but it’s not clear the virus was viable.
lead_paragraph: Forgotten vials of smallpox were discovered by workers cleaning out an old storage room, but it’s not clear the virus was viable.

headline.main: Vials of Smallpox Found in F.D.A. Storage Room
headline.print_headline: Forgotten vials of smallpox found in storage room
